odbcconf.exe executed with /S /A {REGSVR.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 logs for processes named 'odbcconf.exe'. Filter for command lines containing '/S /A' and 'REGSVR'. Collect count of occurrences per host/user. Use descriptive statistics to identify outliers or sudden increases in this activity.

odbcconf.exe loading an unusual or malic.Action: Examine the command line arguments of 'odbcconf.exe' executions captured by Windows Event ID 4688. Extract the path to the DLL being loaded. Compare the loaded DLL path against known trusted locations and a blacklist of known malicious DLLs. Use correlation analysis to link odbcconf.exe execution to prior/subsequent process executions or network connections.
